text: callosum 7.5% Arnold-Chiari malformation 7.5% Cataract 7.5% Cyclopia 7.5% Glaucoma 7.5% Holoprosencephaly 7.5% Iris coloboma 7.5% Microcornea 7.5% Postaxial hand polydactyly 7.5% Spina bifida 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
